forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 24. Wind chill values as low as -1. West wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow after 11pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 20, with temperatures rising to around 26 overnight. Southwest wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
This morning, Boston awakens to a tranquil scene, bathed in the soft light of dawn. The air is crisp, with a shiver at the edges, as temperatures settle near twenty degrees. Despite the cold, the sky reveals a splendid clarity, tinged with the gentle hues of a winter sunrise. The forecast hints at a pleasant, albeit brisk, day ahead, with abundant sunshine and a high creeping toward twenty-four degrees. One might feel a biting chill on exposed skin, a reminder of winter’s unyielding touch, as a gentle west wind whispers through the streets.

As evening approaches, a subtle transformation awaits. Clouds will gather, promising a chance of snow after nightfall, though only a modest accumulation is expected. This shift invites a certain coziness, a call for warm layers—a thick sweater or a stylish coat, perhaps paired with a scarf to shield against the chill and an extra layer to fend off the evening’s embrace. In this dynamic weather, one might stroll through a nearby park, savoring the crispness of the air, or settle into a local café, cradling a warm drink, watching the world transform as snowflakes begin to dance in the light. With each moment, Boston reveals its winter charm, urging us to embrace the quiet beauty of the season.
